title: Episode 209: The Murder of Robert Poynter
description:
A decorated firefighter, a dedicated dad, and an optimistic husband. His family knew that they may lose him suddenly, but they never predicted the cause would be murder. Late one night in 2016, police responded to frantic 911 calls from a dirt road in Texas. When they arrived, the only witness began giving details that just didn’t add up. 

Head to sinisterhood.com/liveshows to purchase in-person tickets for our October 27th live show
